leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 气候-数值模式与数据同化生态
leaf_cluster.task_chain: 模式→同化→评估→后处理→复现
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 模式组件 + 同化库 + 评测

tools.name: BSplineInterpolation
tools.one_line_profile: Fast C++ library for B-Spline interpolation on arbitrary dimension Cartesian mesh grids
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ library designed for performing B-Spline interpolation on Cartesian mesh grids of arbitrary dimensions. It is optimized for speed and numerical accuracy, making it suitable for scientific computing tasks requiring grid resampling or continuous field reconstruction.

tools.name: GalerkinSparseGrids.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Sparse Grid Discretization with Discontinuous Galerkin Method for PDEs
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library implementing Sparse Grid Discretization using the Discontinuous Galerkin Method. It is designed for solving Partial Differential Equations (PDEs) efficiently, particularly in high-dimensional settings where sparse grids offer computational advantages.

tools.name: PMPrimer
tools.one_line_profile: Automated design of multiplex PCR primer pairs
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for the automatic design of multiplex PCR primer pairs for diverse templates. It assists biologists in designing primers for experiments, optimizing for compatibility and efficiency in multiplex reactions.

tools.name: arm-gcm-diagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostics package for climate model evaluation using ARM data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package developed for the evaluation of Global Climate Models (GCM) using data from the Atmospheric Radiation Measurement (ARM) user facility. It provides diagnostic tools to compare model outputs with observational data.

tools.name: CDO
tools.one_line_profile: Climate Data Operators for processing climate and forecast data
tools.detailed_description: Climate Data Operators (CDO) is a collection of command-line operators to manipulate and analyze climate and numerical weather prediction data. It supports standard formats like GRIB and NetCDF and provides essential functions for data processing, math, and statistics.

tools.name: ag5Tools
tools.one_line_profile: R toolbox for AgERA5 dataset access and extraction
tools.detailed_description: An R toolbox designed to facilitate the downloading and extraction of data from the AgERA5 dataset (Agrometeorological indicators derived from reanalysis). It simplifies the process of acquiring climate data for agricultural research.

tools.name: smolyak-anisotropic
tools.one_line_profile: Smolyak method implementation for solving dynamic economic models
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB library implementing the Smolyak method for solving dynamic economic models. It features Lagrange interpolation, anisotropic grids, and adaptive domains, useful for high-dimensional numerical problems in economics and other sciences.

tools.name: pangeo-pyinterp
tools.one_line_profile: Optimized interpolation library for geospatial data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing high-performance interpolation methods for geospatial data. It is part of the Pangeo ecosystem and is optimized for handling large-scale oceanographic and meteorological datasets.

tools.name: climate-ref
tools.one_line_profile: Rapid Evaluation Framework for CMIP simulations
tools.detailed_description: A framework designed for the rapid evaluation of CMIP (Coupled Model Intercomparison Project) simulations. It automates the generation of diagnostic plots and metrics to assess climate model performance.

tools.name: TempestRemap
tools.one_line_profile: Remapping software for climate applications
tools.detailed_description: A software package for remapping (regridding) climate data between different grid systems. It supports high-order conservative remapping and is widely used in climate modeling workflows to standardize grid formats.

tools.name: Pythie
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for weather forecast post-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package dedicated to the post-processing of weather forecasts. It includes modules for member-by-member ensemble forecast post-processing based on past reforecasts, aiding in the calibration and improvement of forecast accuracy.

tools.name: FIDASIM
tools.one_line_profile: Neutral Beam and Fast-ion Diagnostic Modeling Suite
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive modeling suite for neutral beam and fast-ion diagnostics in fusion plasmas. It simulates signals for various diagnostics like FIDA (Fast-Ion D-Alpha), NPA (Neutral Particle Analyzer), and neutron detectors.

tools.name: BME-X
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for Brain MRI enhancement and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model designed for enhancing magnetic resonance images (MRI) of the brain. It supports downstream tasks such as segmentation, registration, and diagnostics, serving as a versatile tool for medical imaging research.

tools.name: Yellowbrick
tools.one_line_profile: Visual analysis and diagnostic tools for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A suite of visual analysis and diagnostic tools designed to facilitate machine learning model selection. It extends the Scikit-Learn API to provide visualizations for feature analysis, model performance, and hyperparameter tuning, widely used in data science and scientific research.

tools.name: e3sm_diags
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostics package for the E3SM climate model
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based diagnostics package specifically designed for the Energy Exascale Earth System Model (E3SM). It provides a comprehensive set of metrics and plots to evaluate the model's performance against observations and other models.

tools.name: PyCNAL_regridding
tools.one_line_profile: Regridding library for PyCNAL ocean model analysis
tools.detailed_description: A library providing regridding capabilities for PyCNAL, facilitating the transformation of ocean model data between different grid systems for analysis and comparison.

tools.name: ESMValCore
tools.one_line_profile: Core engine for ESMValTool data pre-processing and analysis
tools.detailed_description: The core library for ESMValTool, responsible for pre-processing data from Earth System Models (ESM) in CMIP. It handles data finding, loading, fixing, and standardization, serving as the backend for the diagnostic tool.

tools.name: ESMValTool
tools.one_line_profile: Community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for Earth System Models
tools.detailed_description: A community-driven diagnostic and performance metrics tool for the routine evaluation of Earth System Models (ESM) participating in CMIP. It allows for reproducible and standardized comparison of model results against observations.

tools.name: ev-sdf-utils
tools.one_line_profile: Marching Cubes and grid interpolation utilities for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A CUDA-accelerated library providing Marching Cubes and grid interpolation operations for PyTorch tensors. It is useful for 3D geometry processing, signed distance field (SDF) manipulation, and physics-based deep learning.

tools.name: pyfesom
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for pre/post-processing FESOM ocean model data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library and set of tools designed for the pre- and post-processing of data from the Finite Element Sea Ice-Ocean Model (FESOM). It supports mesh handling, data visualization, and analysis of unstructured grid data.

tools.name: climatereconstructionAI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning tool for climate data reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A software package for training and evaluating deep learning models (U-Net with partial convolutions) to reconstruct missing values in climate datasets, such as HadCRUT4. It enables data inpainting for incomplete climate records.

tools.name: GliderTools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for processing Seaglider oceanographic data
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolkit for processing NetCDF files from Seaglider base stations. It includes functions for despiking, smoothing, outlier detection, calibration, and gridding of oceanographic data collected by autonomous gliders.

tools.name: GridTools
tools.one_line_profile: Performance portable libraries for weather and climate applications
tools.detailed_description: A set of libraries and utilities designed to develop performance-portable applications for weather and climate modeling. It abstracts hardware details, allowing code to run efficiently on various architectures (CPUs, GPUs) typically used in HPC environments.

tools.name: nCov2019
tools.one_line_profile: R package to query and analyze COVID-19 statistics
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides an interface to query historical and current statistics of COVID-19 cases. It facilitates data access for epidemiological analysis and visualization.

tools.name: xESMF
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Regridder for Geospatial Data based on ESMF
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for regridding geospatial data, acting as a wrapper around the Earth System Modeling Framework (ESMF) regridding algorithms. It integrates seamlessly with Xarray and is widely used in climate science for grid transformation.

tools.name: regulargrid
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate linear interpolation on regular grids
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing multivariate linear interpolation on regular grids. It provides a fast and simple interface for interpolating data in arbitrary dimensions, useful in various scientific computing contexts.

tools.name: InterpolateR
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance R package for spatial interpolation of environmental data
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance R package designed for spatial interpolation of grid- or point-based environmental data. It utilizes data.table and terra to provide fast, scalable, and customizable interpolation solutions.

tools.name: ClimateTools.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Julia package for climate science data analysis and visualization
tools.detailed_description: A Julia package designed to facilitate the analysis and visualization of climate science data, providing tools for handling common climate data formats and operations.

tools.name: ConservativeRegridding.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Conservative interpolation library for 2D grids in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library that implements conservative interpolation between two grids in two dimensions, ensuring mass/flux conservation during regridding processes.

tools.name: cdo-api-py
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface to the Climate Data Operators (CDO) API
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to the CDO (Climate Data Operators) API, allowing users to access CDO's climate data processing functionalities directly from Python scripts.

tools.name: sparselt
tools.one_line_profile: Vectorized sparse linear transforms for Earth system data regridding
tools.detailed_description: A small Python library designed for regridding Earth system data using vectorized sparse linear transforms, offering efficient processing for scientific datasets.

tools.name: climatePy
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for retrieving climate data by Area of Interest
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that facilitates getting point and gridded climate data based on an Area of Interest (AOI), streamlining data access for climate research.

tools.name: dcurves
tools.one_line_profile: Decision Curve Analysis for evaluating prediction models
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing Andrew Vickers' Decision Curve Analysis method, used to evaluate the clinical utility of prediction models and diagnostic tests.

tools.name: CSET
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for evaluation of weather and climate models
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit developed by the Met Office for the evaluation and diagnostics of weather and climate models, supporting the assessment of model performance.

tools.name: CVDP-ncl
tools.one_line_profile: Climate Variability Diagnostics Package
tools.detailed_description: An analysis tool developed by NCAR that documents the major modes of climate variability in models and observations using NCL.

tools.name: MELODIES-MONET
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic tool for evaluating models against observations
tools.detailed_description: A diagnostic tool for evaluating atmospheric models against a variety of observations including surface, aircraft, and satellite data within a common framework.

tools.name: PyConform
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for converting CESM output to CMIP6 standard
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool designed to convert CESM (Community Earth System Model) time-series output into CMIP6 standard time-series format.

tools.name: wrf-python
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic and interpolation routines for WRF-ARW Model
tools.detailed_description: A collection of diagnostic and interpolation routines for use with output from the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF-ARW) Model.

tools.name: EMC_verif-global
tools.one_line_profile: GFS verification package using MET and METplus
tools.detailed_description: A verification package for the Global Forecast System (GFS) developed by NOAA-EMC, utilizing MET and METplus frameworks.

tools.name: MDTF-diagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Process-oriented diagnostics framework for weather and climate simulations
tools.detailed_description: An analysis framework and collection of process-oriented diagnostics for evaluating weather and climate simulations, developed by NOAA-GFDL.

tools.name: gval
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for evaluating geospatial dataset skill
tools.detailed_description: A high-level Python framework to evaluate the skill of geospatial datasets by comparing candidates to benchmark maps, producing agreement maps and metrics.

tools.name: ninterp
tools.one_line_profile: Rust library for N-dimensional numerical interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A Rust library for performing numerical interpolation in N-dimensions over rectilinear grids, suitable for high-performance scientific computing tasks.

tools.name: ARMP
tools.one_line_profile: Atmospheric River Metrics Package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for calculating and analyzing metrics related to Atmospheric Rivers, used in climate research.

tools.name: pcmdi_metrics
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation package for Climate and Earth System Models
tools.detailed_description: An open-source Python package for the collective and systematic evaluation of Climate and Earth System Models (ESMs), providing standard metrics and diagnostics.

tools.name: cdom
tools.one_line_profile: R package for CDOM absorption spectra metrics
tools.detailed_description: An R package that implements various functions to model and calculate metrics from absorption spectra of chromophotic dissolved organic matter (CDOM).

tools.name: cdot
tools.one_line_profile: Transcript version handling for HGVS libraries
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for managing transcript versions in HGVS (Human Genome Variation Society) variant descriptions, supporting bioinformatics workflows.

tools.name: SGpp
tools.one_line_profile: Numerical library for Sparse Grids
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive numerical library for Sparse Grids, supporting various variants for high-dimensional problems in scientific computing and simulation.

tools.name: climate4R
tools.one_line_profile: R Framework for Climate Data Access and Post-processing
tools.detailed_description: A bundle of R packages forming a framework for climate data access, post-processing, and analysis, enabling seamless workflows in climate research.

tools.name: downscaleR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for climate data bias correction and downscaling
tools.detailed_description: An R package within the climate4R framework dedicated to bias correction and statistical downscaling of climate data.

tools.name: transformeR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for climate data post-processing
tools.detailed_description: An R package within the climate4R framework for data transformation and post-processing tasks, including regridding and subsetting.

tools.name: iris-esmf-regrid
tools.one_line_profile: ESMF regridding schemes for Iris
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that provides structured and unstructured ESMF (Earth System Modeling Framework) regridding schemes for the Iris data analysis library.

tools.name: PiML-Toolbox
tools.one_line_profile: Python toolbox for interpretable machine learning model development and diagnostics
tools.detailed_description: PiML (Python Interpretable Machine Learning) is a toolbox designed for model development and diagnostics, focusing on interpretability in machine learning workflows. It provides a suite of tools for assessing model behavior, essential for reliable scientific AI applications.

tools.name: Teeth Segmentation U-Net
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for automatic semantic segmentation of teeth in panoramic X-ray images
tools.detailed_description: A U-Net based deep learning model implementation for the automatic semantic segmentation of teeth in panoramic X-ray images. This tool aids in providing diagnostic information for dental disorders and conditions.

tools.name: WD_models
tools.one_line_profile: Python package for White Dwarf photometry and physical parameter transformations
tools.detailed_description: A Python package facilitating transformations between White Dwarf photometry (from Gaia, SDSS, WISE, etc.) and physical parameters. It relies on interpolation of existing atmosphere grids and cooling models.

tools.name: textmineR
tools.one_line_profile: R package for text mining and topic modeling diagnostics
tools.detailed_description: An R package designed to aid text mining, providing wrappers for topic models and additional functionality for analyzing and diagnosing topic models. It facilitates qualitative data analysis in social and data sciences.

tools.name: ToolBeHonest
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark for diagnosing hallucinations in tool-augmented Large Language Models
tools.detailed_description: A multi-level hallucination diagnostic benchmark specifically designed for tool-augmented Large Language Models (LLMs). It serves as an evaluation framework to assess the reliability of AI models in scientific and general tasks.

tools.name: cdo-bindings
tools.one_line_profile: Python and Ruby bindings for Climate Data Operators (CDO)
tools.detailed_description: Provides Python and Ruby bindings for CDO (Climate Data Operators), a standard toolset for processing climate and weather data. This enables researchers to integrate CDO functionalities directly into their scripting workflows.

tools.name: xpose
tools.one_line_profile: R package for pharmacometric model diagnostics and visualization
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing graphical diagnostics for pharmacometric models. It is widely used in drug development and population pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics (PK/PD) analysis.

tools.name: xpose4
tools.one_line_profile: Model building aid for population analysis using NONMEM
tools.detailed_description: A classic R package serving as a model building aid for population analysis using NONMEM. It provides tools for data exploration and model diagnostics in pharmacometrics.

tools.name: verif
tools.one_line_profile: Graphical tool for weather forecast verification and plotting
tools.detailed_description: A command-line and graphical tool designed for creating verification plots of weather forecasts. It supports various metrics to evaluate the accuracy of meteorological models against observation data.

tools.name: ComfyUI-InferenceTimeScaling
tools.one_line_profile: Inference-time optimization extension for diffusion models
tools.detailed_description: An extension for ComfyUI that provides inference-time optimization techniques to enhance diffusion-based image generation quality. It utilizes random search and zero-order optimization algorithms for scientific study of generative models.

tools.name: nconv
tools.one_line_profile: PyTorch implementation of Normalized Convolution for sparse depth regression
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch implementation of 'Confidence Propagation through CNNs for Guided Sparse Depth Regression'. It provides the Normalized Convolution layer useful for handling sparse data in computer vision tasks.

tools.name: lm-diagnostics
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic tests for linguistic capacities in language models
tools.detailed_description: A suite of diagnostic tests designed to evaluate the linguistic capacities of language models. It helps researchers understand the capabilities and limitations of LLMs in processing specific linguistic structures.

tools.name: artic-ncov2019
tools.one_line_profile: ARTIC nanopore sequencing protocol and tools for SARS-CoV-2
tools.detailed_description: The ARTIC network's repository containing protocols, primer schemes, and bioinformatics tools for Nanopore sequencing of the nCoV-2019 (SARS-CoV-2) virus. It is a standard resource for viral genomic epidemiology.

tools.name: badlands-companion
tools.one_line_profile: Pre- and post-processing tools for the Badlands landscape evolution model
tools.detailed_description: A companion Python package for the Badlands landscape evolution model. It provides functionalities for pre-processing input data and post-processing simulation outputs, facilitating geological and geomorphological research.

tools.name: btwxt
tools.one_line_profile: N-dimensional grid interpolation library for data processing
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library providing N-dimensional grid interpolation capabilities, useful for regridding and processing scientific datasets.

tools.name: esmtools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Earth System Model (ESM) analysis and pre-processing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to facilitate the analysis of Earth System Model output, providing common analysis functions and statistical tools.

tools.name: gonzag
tools.one_line_profile: Interpolation tool for ocean/atmosphere GCM data onto satellite tracks
tools.detailed_description: A tool for interpolating gridded 2D ocean or atmosphere General Circulation Model (GCM) data onto 1D satellite tracks, enabling direct comparison and spectral analysis.

tools.name: BiasAdjustCXX
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance bias correction tool for climate research
tools.detailed_description: A command-line tool written in C++ for applying bias correction techniques to climate model data, optimized for performance.

tools.name: python-cmethods
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of bias correction techniques for climate sciences
tools.detailed_description: A Python library implementing various bias correction methods (e.g., quantile mapping) for adjusting climate model simulations against observational data.

tools.name: virtues
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model framework for multiplexed tissue imaging data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A framework for analyzing multiplexed tissue imaging data across molecular, cellular, and tissue scales, facilitating biological discovery and diagnostics.

tools.name: CDO-Anomaly-Localization
tools.one_line_profile: Collaborative Discrepancy Optimization for image anomaly localization
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Collaborative Discrepancy Optimization (CDO) method for reliable image anomaly localization, applicable in computer vision tasks.

tools.name: ncov2019-artic-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 field bioinformatics
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for running the ARTIC network's field bioinformatics tools, specifically designed for analyzing nCoV-2019 sequencing data.

tools.name: ECGFM-KED
tools.one_line_profile: Foundation model for ECG diagnostics and explanation
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model framework for Electrocardiogram (ECG) analysis, capable of diagnosing and explaining various diseases and rhythms.

tools.name: MBC
tools.one_line_profile: Multivariate Bias Correction of Climate Model Outputs
tools.detailed_description: An R package for multivariate bias correction of climate model outputs, ensuring statistical consistency across multiple variables.

tools.name: fast_interp
tools.one_line_profile: Numba-accelerated interpolation on regular grids
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing fast, numba-accelerated interpolation for regular grids in 1, 2, and 3 dimensions, useful for numerical simulations.

tools.name: ncollide
tools.one_line_profile: 2D and 3D collision detection library
tools.detailed_description: A collision detection library in Rust, suitable for physics simulations and geometric queries in scientific computing contexts.

tools.name: hagelslag
tools.one_line_profile: Object-based verification and tracking of weather fields
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for segmentation and tracking of weather fields (like storms) and scalable verification, including performance and reliability diagrams.

tools.name: topicdoc
tools.one_line_profile: Topic-specific diagnostics for LDA and CTM topic models
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing diagnostic tools for evaluating Latent Dirichlet Allocation (LDA) and Correlated Topic Models (CTM).

tools.name: METplus
tools.one_line_profile: Python scripting infrastructure for Model Evaluation Tools (MET)
tools.detailed_description: A framework that provides the infrastructure to run the Model Evaluation Tools (MET) suite, facilitating verification and validation of numerical weather prediction models.

tools.name: downscaling-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for local application of global water resources reanalysis
tools.detailed_description: Python programs and procedures to facilitate the downscaling and local application of the earth2observe global water resources reanalysis data.

tools.name: gribmagic
tools.one_line_profile: Generic weather forecast downloader
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to download weather forecast data, specifically handling GRIB formats commonly used in meteorology.

tools.name: ibicus
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for bias correction of climate models and evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A flexible Python toolkit for applying bias correction methods to climate model outputs and evaluating the results.

tools.name: ecpoint-calibrate
tools.one_line_profile: GUI for calibration and verification of NWP model outputs
tools.detailed_description: An interactive tool for the calibration and conditional verification of numerical weather prediction (NWP) model outputs against point observations.

tools.name: MinMaj-Adaptation-Diffusion
tools.one_line_profile: Agent-based model for climate change adaptation evolution
tools.detailed_description: An agent-based model (ABM) to evaluate social factors affecting the evolution of community-based adaptations to climate change.

tools.name: rcdo
tools.one_line_profile: R wrapper for the Climate Data Operators (CDO)
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing an interface to the Climate Data Operators (CDO) command-line utility, enabling climate data processing within R.

tools.name: interpret-lm-knowledge
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic benchmark for extracting knowledge graphs from language models
tools.detailed_description: A tool for diagnosing the performance of language models by extracting knowledge graphs, serving as a benchmark for model interpretability and knowledge retention.

tools.name: Verde
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning based processing and gridding of spatial data
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for processing and gridding spatial data using Green's functions, designed for geophysics and climate data interpolation and regridding.

tools.name: WindNinja
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic wind model for wildland fire modeling
tools.detailed_description: A computer program that computes spatially varying wind fields for wildland fire application, simulating micro-scale wind flow over complex terrain.

tools.name: DHARMa
tools.one_line_profile: Residual diagnostics for hierarchical regression models
tools.detailed_description: An R package providing simulation-based residual diagnostics for hierarchical (multi-level) regression models, useful in ecological and biological statistical analysis.

tools.name: HEMCO
tools.one_line_profile: Harmonized Emissions Component for atmospheric models
tools.detailed_description: A software component for computing emissions in atmospheric models, developed by the GEOS-Chem Support Team, allowing for the calculation of emissions from various sources.

tools.name: ggResidpanel
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic plots for model residuals in R
tools.detailed_description: An R package for creating panels of diagnostic plots for residuals from various model types, facilitating statistical model evaluation.

tools.name: gglm
tools.one_line_profile: Grammar of Graphics for linear model diagnostics
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides a grammar of graphics approach to creating diagnostic plots for linear models, enhancing model evaluation workflows.

tools.name: pydaymet
tools.one_line_profile: Access and post-processing for Daymet climate data
tools.detailed_description: A part of the HyRiver software stack, this tool allows for retrieving and post-processing climate data from the Daymet Web Service.

tools.name: pypsy
tools.one_line_profile: Psychometrics analysis package
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for psychometrics including Item Response Theory (IRT), Multidimensional IRT, and Cognitive Diagnostic Models.

tools.name: bspline-fortran
tools.one_line_profile: Multidimensional B-Spline interpolation library
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran library for multidimensional B-Spline interpolation of data on a regular grid, useful for numerical modeling and scientific data processing.

tools.name: regridpack
tools.one_line_profile: Modern Fortran regridding library
tools.detailed_description: A modern Fortran edition of the REGRIDPACK library for regridding data from one grid to another, essential for climate model data post-processing.

tools.name: xMIP
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis ready CMIP6 data processing tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to make CMIP6 data analysis ready, leveraging Pangeo tools for cleaning, preprocessing, and standardizing climate model output.

tools.name: C-ESM-EP
tools.one_line_profile: CliMAF Earth System Model Evaluation Platform
tools.detailed_description: A platform developed for the evaluation of IPSL and CNRM climate models, providing standard diagnostics and comparisons for Earth System Models.

tools.name: Ncorr
tools.one_line_profile: 2D Digital Image Correlation (DIC) software for materials analysis
tools.detailed_description: An open-source MATLAB software for 2D Digital Image Correlation (DIC), widely used in experimental mechanics and materials science to measure displacement and strain fields from image data.

tools.name: cmip6-to-wrfinterm
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to process CMIP6 data for driving WRF model
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool designed to process and downscale Global Climate Model (GCM) data from CMIP6 into intermediate formats required to drive the Weather Research and Forecasting (WRF) regional model.

tools.name: ClimateOperators
tools.one_line_profile: R wrappers for CDO and NCO climate data tools
tools.detailed_description: An R package that provides convenient wrappers around the standard Climate Data Operators (CDO) and NetCDF Operators (NCO), enabling efficient climate data manipulation directly within R environments.

tools.name: pyhddmjags
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical Drift Diffusion Model (HDDM) using JAGS
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface for implementing Hierarchical Drift Diffusion Models (HDDM) using the JAGS (Just Another Gibbs Sampler) engine, used in cognitive science and neuroscience for modeling decision-making processes.

tools.name: CDFTOOLS
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostic tools for NEMO ocean model output
tools.detailed_description: A Fortran package developed for the analysis and diagnostics of output from the NEMO (Nucleus for European Modelling of the Ocean) model, capable of computing various physical oceanographic quantities from NetCDF output.

tools.name: gcmeval
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation framework for Global Climate Models
tools.detailed_description: An R package from the Norwegian Meteorological Institute for evaluating Global Climate Models (GCMs) by comparing them against observational datasets, supporting climate model validation tasks.

tools.name: pyaerocom
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for climate and air quality model evaluation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed for the evaluation and analysis of aerosol and climate models, facilitating comparisons between model outputs and observations within the AeroCom project framework.

tools.name: sparsegrid
tools.one_line_profile: Smolyak sparse grid interpolation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Smolyak sparse grid interpolation, a numerical method used in scientific computing for high-dimensional integration and interpolation tasks where full grids are computationally prohibitive.

tools.name: WeatherReal-Benchmark
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation pipelines for weather forecast verification
tools.detailed_description: A set of evaluation pipelines and components supporting the WeatherReal benchmark, designed to verify and assess the performance of weather forecasting models against real-world observational data.

tools.name: scores
tools.one_line_profile: Metrics for verification of forecasts and models
tools.detailed_description: A Python library containing a comprehensive collection of mathematical metrics and scoring rules for the verification, evaluation, and optimization of probabilistic and deterministic weather/climate forecasts.

tools.name: NCO
tools.one_line_profile: NetCDF Operators for data manipulation
tools.detailed_description: A suite of command-line programs known as NetCDF Operators (NCO) that facilitate the manipulation, analysis, and processing of self-describing data stored in the netCDF format, essential for climate and meteorological research.

tools.name: pynco
tools.one_line_profile: Python bindings for NetCDF Operators (NCO)
tools.detailed_description: A Python interface to the NetCDF Operators (NCO), allowing users to invoke NCO's powerful data manipulation commands directly within Python scripts and scientific workflows.

tools.name: Nextstrain ncov
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for SARS-CoV-2 evolution tracking
tools.detailed_description: The official Nextstrain build pipeline for SARS-CoV-2, providing a complete workflow for phylogenetic analysis, viral evolution tracking, and visualization of genomic epidemiology data.

tools.name: climpred
tools.one_line_profile: Verification and analysis of weather and climate forecasts
tools.detailed_description: A python package for the verification of weather and climate forecasts, providing a high-level interface for computing deterministic and probabilistic metrics.

tools.name: xESMF
tools.one_line_profile: Universal Regridder for Geospatial Data
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for regridding geospatial data, wrapping the ESMPy library to provide a high-level, xarray-integrated interface for converting between different grid formats.

tools.name: nctoolkit
tools.one_line_profile: NetCDF analysis and post-processing toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for comprehensive analysis and post-processing of NetCDF data, wrapping CDO (Climate Data Operators) for efficient manipulation of climate datasets.

tools.name: pmp-library
tools.one_line_profile: Polygon Mesh Processing Library
tools.detailed_description: A modern C++ library for processing polygon surface meshes, providing algorithms for smoothing, decimation, remeshing, and subdivision, widely used in scientific modeling and geometry processing.

tools.name: talos
tools.one_line_profile: Rare Disease variant reanalysis tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the reanalysis of genomic variants in the context of rare diseases, aiding in the identification of pathogenic variants.

tools.name: gridded
tools.one_line_profile: Unified API for grid interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a single API for working with and interpolating results from various model grid types (regular, curvilinear, unstructured), developed within the IOOS ecosystem.

tools.name: pyresample
tools.one_line_profile: Geospatial image resampling toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for resampling geospatial image data, handling various grid definitions and projection transformations, commonly used in remote sensing and earth observation.

tools.name: RavenR
tools.one_line_profile: Interface for Raven hydrologic modelling framework
tools.detailed_description: An R package for handling inputs, outputs, and diagnostics for the Raven hydrologic modelling framework, facilitating hydrological analysis and model evaluation.

tools.name: linterp
tools.one_line_profile: N-dimensional linear interpolation library
tools.detailed_description: A C++ library for performing N-dimensional linear interpolation on rectangular grids, useful for numerical analysis and scientific data processing.

tools.name: CliMT-legacy
tools.one_line_profile: Climate modelling and diagnostics toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for climate modelling and diagnostics, providing components to build and analyze climate models (Legacy version).

tools.name: ILAMB
tools.one_line_profile: International Land Model Benchmarking System
tools.detailed_description: A Python software package used for the International Land Model Benchmarking (ILAMB) project, designed to evaluate and benchmark land surface models against observational data.

tools.name: RET-CLIP
tools.one_line_profile: Retinal Image Foundation Model
tools.detailed_description: A foundation model pre-trained with clinical diagnostic reports for retinal image analysis, enabling downstream diagnostic tasks.

tools.name: climetrics
tools.one_line_profile: Climate Change Metrics Calculator
tools.detailed_description: An R package for calculating various climate change metrics and indices to support climate variability analysis.

tools.name: GridInterpolations.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Multidimensional grid interpolation in Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library for performing multidimensional interpolation on arbitrary grids, suitable for high-performance scientific computing tasks.

tools.name: torch-cubic-spline-grids
tools.one_line_profile: Cubic spline interpolation on multidimensional grids in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch library for performing cubic spline interpolation on multidimensional grids, useful for differentiable scientific computing and image processing.

tools.name: torch-image-interpolation
tools.one_line_profile: Interpolation and gridding for 2D and 3D images in PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: A library providing interpolation and gridding functionalities for 2D and 3D images using PyTorch, supporting scientific imaging tasks.

tools.name: grid
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for numerical operations on molecular grids
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for performing numerical integration, interpolation, and differentiation on grids, specifically tailored for theoretical chemistry applications.

tools.name: TerraNNI
tools.one_line_profile: Natural neighbor interpolation for generating DEMs from point clouds
tools.detailed_description: A C++ tool that interpolates grid Digital Elevation Models (DEMs) from large 2D and 3D point clouds using a variant of natural neighbor interpolation.

tools.name: Grid.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Interpolation and grid operations library for Julia
tools.detailed_description: A Julia library providing efficient interpolation and related operations on grids, serving as a fundamental building block for scientific computing in Julia.

tools.name: bcsd-python
tools.one_line_profile: Bias Correction and Spatial Downscaling (BCSD) tool for climate data
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that utilizes CDO (Climate Data Operators) to apply daily climate downscaling using the Bias Correction and Spatial Downscaling (BCSD) method.

tools.name: cmip6_downloader
tools.one_line_profile: Utility for downloading CMIP6 climate data
tools.detailed_description: A simple Python tool designed to facilitate the downloading of CMIP6 (Coupled Model Intercomparison Project Phase 6) and potentially CMIP5 files.

tools.name: model2roms
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for creating ROMS forcing files
tools.detailed_description: A Python toolbox for generating forcing files required to run the Regional Ocean Modeling System (ROMS), facilitating oceanographic modeling workflows.

tools.name: spatial-interpolators
tools.one_line_profile: Spatial interpolation for Cartesian and spherical grids
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python functions to perform spatial interpolation of data over Cartesian and spherical grids, useful for geospatial and climate data analysis.

tools.name: xarray-regrid
tools.one_line_profile: Regridding utility for xarray data structures
tools.detailed_description: An extension for xarray that provides regridding capabilities, allowing users to transform data between different grids, essential for climate and geospatial data analysis.

tools.name: interflex
tools.one_line_profile: Diagnostics and visualization for multiplicative interaction models
tools.detailed_description: An R package for estimating, diagnosing, and visualizing multiplicative interaction models, providing flexible marginal effect estimates for statistical analysis.

tools.name: kiauhoku
tools.one_line_profile: Utilities for stellar model grid interpolation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing utilities for interacting with and interpolating stellar model grids, supporting astronomical research.
